Posts.Content: CJT511 wrote: I will start my chemo on August 26th.  I like being prepared so does anyone have recommendations on clothing that makes it easier for treatment through a port?  I'm thinking maybe a zipped shirt but was looking for what worked for others.  Thanks in advance. Dx 6/18/2014, ILC, 1cm, Stage IA, Grade 2, 2/4 nodes, ER+/PR+, HER2- Surgery 7/31/2014 Lumpectomy: Right; Lymph node removal: Right, Sentinel Chemotherapy 8/26/2014 AC + T (Taxol) Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Clothing recommendations for chemo treatment CJT511 knmtwins
